page.shortlink: fieldprops display settings display unformat property
page.description: An expression that defines how to translate the displayed value into the value saved in the record. The *[ui:Display unformat]* expression is required if the field has a *[ui:Display format]* and is editable.

discussion.p: Specify how this field should be unformatted before changes are saved in the database. Enter an Xbasic expression that uses the <value> placeholder to un-format the data. It may be necessary to wrap the <value> placeholder in the [convert_type() function] to ensure that <value> returns the correct data type that your un-format expression expects.
